title: Resilience and Professional Ethics Competency Enhancement Program for Polytechnic Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and foundational vocational competencies
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment system utilizing a smartphone-based learning platform (SMART Poltekad)

learning_goals: Students will perform resilience required in real professional situations with over 80% accuracy through an interdisciplinary approach.
Learners will successfully resolve professional ethics dilemmas at least three times through customized assignments based on the ATI model, enhancing their decision-making skills.
By the end of the 6-month course, learners will achieve scores improved by at least 25% compared to baseline assessments in the Resilience Scale (RS-14) and professional ethics awareness test.

resources: Offline Workshop Kit (Role-Play Scenarios, Ethical Dilemma Cards)
Online Collaboration Tools (KakaoTalk Group Chat, Google Drive)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
